about_the_game:
Elementix is an online social deduction game where trust and betrayal collide. In the game, each character has their own unique abilities, and 5 to 16 players compete as good, evil, or neutral characters. Work together to complete tasks, but beware of the hidden minority that's out to get you!

In Elementix, the good characters must balance completing tasks with identifying and eliminating the evil ones. The evil characters will use every possible means to sabotage tasks and eliminate the good characters. Players can discuss their suspicions and vote to eliminate those they see as a threat, so every decision is crucial.

Each character in Elementix has unique abilities, designed to take on different strategic roles like defense and offense. The map includes outdoor environments as well as indoor hiding spots and underground passages that allow players to sneak around and deceive their opponents. With this intense blend of cooperation and betrayal, Elementix keeps you on your toes, ensuring every playthrough is a unique experience.
